name: skills-builder
description: A CLI tool for checking, creating, and managing Claude Code skills according to best practices

scripts.build: bun build src/cli/index.js --outdir dist/cli --target node --platform neutral
scripts.build:analyzer: bun build src/analyzer/index.js --outdir dist/analyzer --target node --platform neutral
scripts.build:validator: bun build src/validator/index.js --outdir dist/validator --target node --platform neutral
scripts.build:generator: bun build src/generator/index.js --outdir dist/generator --target node --platform neutral
scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:analyzer && bun run build:validator && bun run build:generator

author: Claude Code
